title: Taken by the Monsters: An Erotic Monster Tale
description: Monsters really do exist!Caught in the rain on the way to a night out, Amy is forced to seek shelter in an abandoned building. Little does she know the building is home to several creatures not of this world, intent on planting their seed deep within her fertile belly. As Amy slowly succumbs to the pleasure of their long and thick members, she abandons her desire for escape and embraces the ecstasy only the creatures can deliver.Only for readers 18 years or older. All characters portrayed in this story are 18+. Contains approximately 6,000 words of explicit sex with monsters, anal penetration, impregnation and other lewd acts.
author: K.J. Burkhardt
